~$ whoami_

Hello, my name is

Fraser Brooks

M.Sci Computer Science

I'm a recent M.Sci Computer Science graduate with a history in design, a budding open-source software enthusiast, and wannabe Haskeller.

I love to create beautiful and useful software and am looking for work in software development, data science, or DevOps. I also have a blog where I write about whatever interests me. See below for examples of my work ↴
